title: Notifia - 30 Widgets, for your Website
shortDescription: Engage, Convert and Retain Website Visitors with 30+ Widgets
longDescription:
Notifia includes a suite of 30+ Engagement Tools for your Website. We currently support 13,000 Websites, and display over 100 million Websites Widgets every month.

- Real-Time Social Proof Widget
- Exit Intent Email Collection
- Call to Action Pop-ups
- Lead Magnets & List Builders
- Welcome & Announcement Bars
- Special Offer/Coupon Code Pop-ups
- Product Promotion Widgets
- Spin to Win (Gamification) Widgets
- Blog Promotion Card
__________
Activation ‚úî
- Behaviour Triggered Messages
- On-Boarding Videos
- Engagement Hub (Support Docs / Knowledge Base Widget)
- Announcement Bar
_________
Revenue üíµ
- Failed Payments Notification (Triggers when a users payment fails, asking them to update Credit Card)
- Product Upsells
__________
Retention üìà
- Subscription Off-Boarding Widget
__________
Referrals ü§ù
- Social Share Bar

- Content Lockers
- Invite a Friend Widget
__________
Feedback üëÇ
- Exit Intent Surveys
- NPS Surveys
- Emoji Feedback
All Website Plugins are included, and we support unlimited Website Visitors, Unlimited Websites, Unlimited Team Members, for $9/month
author: Notifia
